```css
// Property: noDeprecation
// Description: The process.noDeprecation property indicates whether the --no-deprecation flag is set on the current Node.js process. See the documentation for the 'warning' event and the emitWarning() method for more information about this flag's behavior.
// Component(s): process
'.no-deprecation': { noDeprecation: true }
'.no-deprecation-false': { noDeprecation: false }
```
